All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointment
This class controls the application window for the AddAppointment.fxml screen.
AddCustomer
This class controls the application window for the AddCustomer.fxml screen.
Appointment
The Appointments class defines an instance of Appointment.
AppointmentView
This class controls the application window for the AppointmentView.fxml screen.
Contact
The Contacts class defines an instance of Contact.
Countries
The Countries class defines an instance of Countries.
Customer
The Customer class defines an instance of Customer.
CustomerRecords
This class controls the application window for the CustomerRecords.fxml screen.
DateAndTimeProcessing
The DateAndTimeProcessing class contains methods for processing dates and times as needed elsewhere in the application.
DBConnection
This class defines the methods necessary to connect the application to the database.
FirstLevelDivision
The FirstLevelDivision class defines an instance of FirstLevelDivision.
LogIn
This class controls the application window for the Login.fxml screen.
LoginActivity
The LoginActivity class provides a method to create and append a user activity report.
Main
The Main class loads an application that allows a user to maintain a calendar of Appointments.
ModifyAppointment
This class controls the application window for the ModifyAppointment.fxml screen.
ModifyCustomer
This class controls the application window for the ModifyCustomer.fxml screen.
Month
The Month class defines an instance of Month.
Queries
This class defines the methods that allow the application to retrieve information from the database.
ReportsView
This class controls the application window for the ReportsView.fxml screen.
Updates
This class defines the methods that allow the application to update database information and add new information to the database.
User
The User class defines an instance of User.
